long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to embark on a thrilling journey of choices? Explore your decision-making skills with Would You Rather, the fun Chrome extension that gives you some tough choices to make.

This isn't your average game â€” it's a party stimulator, and a boredom demolisher!

Choose from four different categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Would You Rather.

Add it to Chrome now and let the good times roll.
